Class Pokemon

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pokemon(Pokemon base)
      Description: A base constructor that takes in a Pokemon object and creates a new Pokemon object with all the properties pre condition: base must not be null and all of it's instance variables must be defined post condition: A new Pokemon object is created
      Pokemon(java.lang.String name, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Type> typeMap)
      Description: Creates a Pokemon object using it's name and looking up and reading the needed information from various spreadsheets using it's name as a reference Pre condition: name must not be null, the name must be a valid Pokemon name in the list/spreadsheet, the typeMap must not be null Post condition: a Pokemon object is created and it's stats and other values calculated and it is now ready to be used

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon(java.lang.String name,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Type> typeMap)
        Description: Creates a Pokemon object using it's name and looking up and reading the needed information from various spreadsheets using it's name as a reference Pre condition: name must not be null, the name must be a valid Pokemon name in the list/spreadsheet, the typeMap must not be null Post condition: a Pokemon object is created and it's stats and other values calculated and it is now ready to be used
        Parameters:
        name - the Pokemon's name as a String
        typeMap - a HashMap that converts the name of a Type from a String to the proper Type object

      • Pokemon

        public Pokemon(Pokemon base)
        Description: A base constructor that takes in a Pokemon object and creates a new Pokemon object with all the properties pre condition: base must not be null and all of it's instance variables must be defined post condition: A new Pokemon object is created
        Parameters:
        base, - a Pokemon object who's information will be cloned to make this new Pokemon object
